archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Party Bill/Invoice Control
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish and maintain party bill invoice formats, maintain lists of parties who are eligible for receiving bills/invoices, and define the billing cycles.

properties.value: Party Bill/Invoice Control establishes and maintains party bill invoice formats, and any interaction with specific parties to modify the format. It maintains lists of parties who are eligible for receiving bills/invoices. It also defines the billing cycles and respective dates according to cash flow needs as established by financial management processes.
